name: firefox-voice
description: This is a WebExtension that allows the browser to be voice-controlled.

scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others --success first --names watch,browser 'npm run watch' 'npm run start-and-build'
scripts.start-and-build: NO_SENTRY=1 IN_DEVELOPMENT=1 npm-run-all maybeinstall build:templates build:manifest build:intent-metadata start-extension
scripts.start-android: concurrently --kill-others --success first --names watch,android 'npm run watch' 'npm run start-and-build-android'
scripts.start-and-build-android: NO_SENTRY=1 IN_DEVELOPMENT=1 ANDROID=1 npm-run-all maybeinstall build:templates build:manifest build:intent-metadata start-android-extension
scripts.build:deps: mkdir -p extension/js/vendor/ extension/css/vendor/ ; for file in lottie-web/build/player/lottie.min.js webextension-polyfill/dist/browser-polyfill.min.js fuse.js/dist/fuse.js react/umd/react.production.min.js react-dom/umd/react-dom.production.min.js chrono-node/dist/chrono.min.js; do cp node_modules/$file extension/js/vendor/ ; done ; cp "node_modules/@sentry/browser/build/bundle.es6.min.js" extension/js/vendor/sentry.js
scripts.build:deps_porcupine: mkdir -p extension/js/vendor/porcupine/ ; for file in porcupine_manager/src/porcupine_manager.js web-voice-processor/src/web_voice_processor.js porcupine_manager/src/porcupine_worker.js web-voice-processor/src/downsampling_worker.js porcupine_manager/src/pv_porcupine.js porcupine_manager/src/porcupine.js porcupine_manager/src/pv_porcupine.wasm ; do cp node_modules/@picovoice/$file extension/js/vendor/porcupine/ ; done
scripts.maybeinstall: if [[ package.json -nt node_modules/last_install.txt ]] ; then npm install && touch node_modules/last_install.txt ; fi
scripts.package: npm-run-all build:* && web-ext build -s extension --overwrite-dest -i '**/*.ejs' -i '**/*.jsx' && mv web-ext-artifacts/*.zip addon.xpi ; echo ./addon.xpi created
